name: Zylo
description: This plugin is used to fetch applications from the **Zylo platform > Inventory > Applications** page. The plugin does not support performing any actions on applications in Zylo.

configuration.label: Token ID
configuration.description: Token ID generated from the Zylo platform. Token ID can be generated from the 'Admin > Company Tokens > Request Token'.

configuration.label: Token Secret
configuration.description: Token Secret generated from the Zylo platform. Token Secret can be generated from the 'Admin > Company Tokens > Request Token'.
